name: Crumbly Castle
description:
Build a sandcastle against all odds! Defend it against critters, ocean waves and worst of all: your needy brother!

Made for Ludum Dare 49!

Instructions Theme Relevance

We inspired ourselves from the following meanings that can be interpreted from the Theme, Unstable:

"Likely to give way" - Sandcastles are not exactly the most stable structures possible, especially with the ocean waves soaking it here and there.

"Likely to change or fail"

  • The environment is regularly changing.

Dylan, his drone and the critters always sabotaging Olivia from building her sandcastle!
